| HistoryText             = The Black Stream was a mercenary group, disguised as policemen, hired by the [[Parker Robbins (Earth-616)|Hood]] to kill the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]].{{r|Punisher Vol 8 3}}

They managed to track him down, but were defeated in [[Chinatown]].{{r|Punisher Vol 8 4}}

The remaining members were killed when the Punisher stormed the [[Parker Robbins (Earth-616)|Hood's]] illegal brothel in [[Bushwick]].{{r|Punisher Vol 8 5}}

The Black Stream used to supply the [[Hood's Gang (Earth-616)|Hood's Gang]] with modern weaponry, power augmentations, and fashion-forward costumes.{{r|Punisher Vol 8 6}}

A Black Stream squad rushed in to rescue [[Character Index/T#Tina|Tina]] when she was trapped by the [[Richard Deacon (Earth-616)|Human Fly]].{{r|Punisher Vol 8 7}}
